scripts.build:vendor: mkdir -p dist/vendor && mkdir -p vendor && rsync -ac vendor/ dist/vendor/ && rsync -ac node_modules/high-tide-flooding-widget/dist/tidalstationswidget.js dist/vendor/ && rsync -ac node_modules/jquery-ui-touch-punch/jquery.ui.touch-punch.min.js dist/vendor/ dist/vendor/ && rsync -ac node_modules/climate-by-location/dist/climate_by_location.climate_explorer.bundle.js dist/vendor/
scripts.build:html: mkdir -p dist && npx template-literals --config config.yml --indexes --outdir dist/ pages/*.js
scripts.build:css: node-sass -o css/ scss/screen.scss --include-path node_modules/compass-mixins/lib/ --output-style expanded --source-comments && mkdir -p dist/css dist/fonts && rsync -ac fonts dist/ && rsync -ac css dist/
scripts.deploy:fli: aws s3 sync --delete --no-follow-symlinks dist/ s3://climate-explorer/ && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E34SU5ZJ0O3LC0 --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy:ce3-dev: aws s3 sync --delete --no-follow-symlinks dist/ s3://climate-explorer3-dev.nemac.org/ && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E48HJ11B8EHXY --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy:ce3-production: aws s3 sync --delete --no-follow-symlinks dist/ s3://climate-explorer3-prod.nemac.org/ && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1Q1S8U8911R6D --paths '/*'
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:html -- -- env=dev && rm -rf dist/js dist/node_modules && ln -srf node_modules js dist/ && static -a 127.0.0.1 -p 8082 dist/
